</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.63</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if the computer has an interface (a real player). False for a dedicated server or for a headless client. </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[hasInterface]] </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isHC = !([[hasInterface]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>||</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[isDedicated]]);</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_isHC = ![[hasInterface]] && ![[isDedicated]];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[isDedicated]], [[isServer]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 21, 2014 - 14:55 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
<code>[[if]] ([[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on dedicated server only
};

[[if]] ([[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	//run on dedicated server or player host
};

[[if]] ([[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. player host
};

[[if]] (![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. player host and headless clients
};

[[if]] (![[isServer]]) [[then]] {
	//run on all player clients incl. headless clients but not player host
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]]) [[then]] {
	//run on headless clients and dedicated server
};

[[if]] (![[hasInterface]] && ![[isDedicated]]) [[then]] {
	//run on headless clients only
};</code>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
